>>Which of the following statements are true considering the below mentioned access patterns for an array "A" in a program?
=====
(1) A[1], A[2], A[3] =====
(2) A[0][1], A[0][2], A[0][3] =====
(3) A[1], A[5000], A[1], A[1], A[5000], A[30], A[30], A[5000], A[1], A[5000] =====
|| There could be more than one option correct. <<
[x] (1) demonstrates spatial locality [ ] (1) demonstrates temporal locality [x] (2) demonstrates spatial locality [ ] (2) demonstrates temporal locality [ ] (3) demonstrates spatial locality [x] (3) demonstrates temporal locality
